## Goal
Enable custom reporting, data export (CSV/PDF/Excel), and advanced visualizations (charts, maps, funnels) for referral analytics.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement backend export services for alumni, admin, and student reports
- [ ] Build frontend UI for report generation and download
- [ ] Integrate charts (Recharts) and maps (Google Maps API)
- [ ] Add scheduled report emails and shareable links
- [ ] Write tests for export accuracy and visualization rendering

## Acceptance Criteria
- Users can generate and download reports in multiple formats
- Visualizations display all key metrics and trends
- Scheduled reports and sharing features work as described
